titles.en: Chapter 78 – Regaring the forbiddance from the name
Chapter 78 – Regaring the forbiddance from the name

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَمَّنْ ذَكَرَهُ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ أَحْمَدَ الْعَلَوِيِّ عَنْ دَاوُدَ بْنِ الْقَاسِمِ الْجَعْفَرِيِّ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ أَبَا الْحَسَنِ الْعَسْكَرِيَّ ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ الْخَلَفُ مِنْ بَعْدِي الْحَسَنُ فَكَيْفَ لَكُمْ بِالْخَلَفِ مِنْ بَعْدِ الْخَلَفِ فَقُلْتُ وَ لِمَ جَعَلَنِيَ اللَّهُ فِدَاكَ قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ لَا تَرَوْنَ شَخْصَهُ وَ لَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ ذِكْرُهُ بِاسْمِهِ فَقُلْتُ فَكَيْفَ نَذْكُرُهُ فَقَالَ قُولُوا الْحُجَّةُ مِنْ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَوَاتُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ وَ سَلَامُهُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Muhammad, from the one who mentioned it, from Muhammad Bin Ahmad Al Alawy, from Dawood Al Qasim Al Ja’fary who said,

‘I heard Abu Al-Hassan Al-Askary<sup>asws</sup> (10<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) saying: ‘The replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>) from after me<sup>asws</sup> is Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup>, so how would it be for you all with the replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>) from after the replacement (Imam<sup>asws</sup>)?’ So I said, ‘And why? May I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>!’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘You all would not be seeing his<sup>asws</sup> person (physically), not would be Permissible for you all to mention him<sup>asws</sup> by his<sup>asws</sup> name’. So I said, ‘So how should we mention him<sup>asws</sup>?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘You should be saying, ‘The Divine Authority (Al-Hujjat) from the Progeny<sup>asws</sup> of Muhammad<sup>saww</sup>’.

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ الصَّالِحِيِّ قَالَ سَأَلَنِي أَصْحَابُنَا بَعْدَ مُضِيِّ أَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَنْ أَسْأَلَ عَنِ الِاسْمِ وَ الْمَكَانِ فَخَرَجَ الْجَوَابُ إِنْ دَلَلْتُهُمْ عَلَى الِاسْمِ أَذَاعُوهُ وَ إِنْ عَرَفُوا الْمَكَانَ دَلُّوا عَلَيْهِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Muhammad, from Abu Abdullah Al Salihy who said,

Our companions asked me after the passing away of Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> (11<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>) that he<sup>asws</sup> was asked about the name and the place, so the answer came out: ‘If they are pointed upon his<sup>asws</sup> name, they would broadcast it, and if they know of the place, they would point (to others) upon it’.

text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ جَعْفَرِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَنِ الرَّيَّانِ بْنِ الصَّلْتِ قَالَ سَمِعْتُ أَبَا الْحَسَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) يَقُولُ وَ سُئِلَ عَنِ الْقَائِمِ فَقَالَ لَا يُرَى جِسْمُهُ وَ لَا يُسَمَّى اسْمُهُ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ja’far Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Fazzal, from Al Rayyan Bin Al Salt who said,

‘I heard Abu Al-Hassan Al-Reza<sup>asws</sup> saying, and he<sup>asws</sup> had been asked about Al-Qaim<sup>asws</sup>. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Neither will his<sup>asws</sup> body be seen, nor would his<sup>asws</sup> name be (specifically) mentioned’.

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْحُسَيْنِ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنِ ابْنِ رِئَابٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ صَاحِبُ هَذَا الْأَمْرِ لَا يُسَمِّيهِ بِاسْمِهِ إِلَّا كَافِرٌ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Muhammad Bin Al Husayn, from Al Hassan Bin Mahboub, from Ibn Ra’ib,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘This Divine Authority, none will name him<sup>asws</sup> by his<sup>asws</sup> name except for an Infidel’.
